feeEducation: Sending payments and making exchanges include a small fee for service security and maintenance.
inviteMoneyEscrow: We’ll keep this money safe until your friend creates a Celo account
keepMoneySafe: We'll keep this money safe until your friend creates a Celo account
searchFriends: Try entering a phone number if you are unable to find who you're looking for
searchForSomeone: Search for someone using their name, phone number, or address
inviteSMS: Welcome to Celo! Get Celo at {{link}} and enter your code to get started: {{code}}
inviteSMSWithEscrowedPayment: Welcome to Celo! I've sent you Celo Dollars. Go to {{link}} and enter your code to get started: {{code}}
writeStorageNeededForQrDownload: Storage write permission is needed for downloading the QR code
cameraScanInfo: Scan code by placing it in the box
cameraNotAuthorizedDescription: Please enable the Camera in your phone’s Settings. You’ll need it to scan QR codes.

verificationCta.body: Verify your phone and sync your contacts to quickly send to your friends.

importContactsCta.body: Please enable Contacts in your phone’s Settings to find your friends by name.

secureSendExplanation.body1: {{e164Number}} has multiple accounts associated with it. {{displayName}} could have created a new Celo account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body2: Before transacting, you must confirm {{displayName}}'s account. You can do this by scanning their QR code or confirming their account number with them.

confirmAccountNumber.title: Confirm Account Number
confirmAccountNumber.body1Partial: Please ask {{displayName}} for the last four digits of their account number and enter it below.
confirmAccountNumber.body1Full: Please ask {{displayName}} for their account number and enter it below.
confirmAccountNumber.body2Partial: For security, please do not use text messaging (SMS). We strongly recommend asking in person or over the phone.
confirmAccountNumber.body2Full: For security, please do not use text messaging (SMS). We strongly recommend asking in person or over the phone, through WhatsApp or Messenger, or by email.

helpModal.body1: Your contact can find their account number (also known as an address) at the top of the Settings menu.
helpModal.body2: Account numbers begin with “0x” and are 42 characters long. They appear directly beneath the profile photo.

transferAddressChanged: This contact changed their account number since the transaction. This payment was sent to:
